# Notes

## How to prepare method2 (pre-built image) from method1

```
cd method1
vagrant up
... wait to finish ...
vagrant halt
vagrant package --base {{instance-name}} --output hadoop.box
```

## Points to note when preparing method1

Insecure key must be appended to `~/.ssh/authorized_keys` before packaging:

```
ssh-rsa  vagrant insecure public key
```

vagrant will substitute insecure key with a newly generated one upon `vagrant up`.
This ensures that you can ssh into the packaged image.
